argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ply1plusg.y | |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ply1plusg.s | |- S = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 3 |  | ply1vscafval.n | |- .x. = ( .s ` Y ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPwSer R ) = ( 1o mPwSer R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` S ) = ( .s ` S ) |
| 6 | 2, 4, 5 | #P_mplvsca2 | |- ( .s ` S ) = ( .s ` ( 1o mPwSer R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` R ) = ( PwSer1 ` R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) = ( .s ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 4, 8 | #P_psr1vsca | |- ( .s ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) = ( .s ` ( 1o mPwSer R ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) e. _V |
| 11 | 1, 7 | #P_ply1val | |- Y = ( ( PwSer1 ` R ) |`s ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 8 | #P_ressvsca | |- ( ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) e. _V -> ( .s ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) = ( .s ` Y ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( .s ` ( PwSer1 ` R ) ) = ( .s ` Y ) |
| 14 | 6, 9, 13 | #P_3eqtr2i | |- ( .s ` S ) = ( .s ` Y ) |
| 15 | 3, 14 | #P_eqtr4i | |- .x. = ( .s ` S ) |
